name: xinjs
description: path-based state management for web apps

scripts.start: bun clear-targets && bun static-assets && bun parcel demo/index.html --dist-dir www -p 8018
scripts.clear-targets: rm -rf .parcel-cache && rm -rf www dist && mkdir -p www/assets
scripts.static-assets: cp readme.md docs/*.md *.svg *.ico *.png www/assets && cp -r demo/assets/* www/assets
scripts.format: bun eslint src demo --fix && bun prettier --write .
scripts.make: bun clear-targets && bun static-assets && bun test && bun parcel build
scripts.pack: bun format && bun run make && npm pack --pack-destination ~
scripts.make-icons: rm -rf static/icons && mkdir static/icons && npx fantasticon

author: Tonio Loewald
